attributes.action: Public opinion on conscription in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Listen the what the people of the UK think about their children being sent off to war
attributes.background:
I want the government to listen the the people of the UK when it comes to making plans to join wars.
Especially regarding conscription

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure if you would like a referendum on conscription or if you do not want conscription to happen. The government haven't announced any plans for national conscription.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
